movies.title: Inception
movies.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the task of planting an idea.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.summary: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who brings chaos to Gotham City.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.summary: A team travels through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.summary: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.summary: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more.

movies.title: Joker
movies.summary: A failed comedian descends into madness and becomes the Joker.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.summary: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to restore his secret identity.

movies.title: Your Name
movies.summary: Two teenagers swap bodies and form a mysterious connection.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.summary: A young drummer enrolls in a music conservatory where he meets a ruthless instructor.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.summary: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the Titanic.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.summary: A hacker learns about the true nature of reality and joins a rebellion.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.summary: The story of Facebook's creation and the lawsuits that followed.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.summary: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.summary: A fearless princess sets off to find her estranged sister whose powers have trapped their kingdom in eternal winter.

movies.title: Coco
movies.summary: A boy who dreams of becoming a musician enters the Land of the Dead.

movies.title: Up
movies.summary: An old man ties thousands of balloons to his house to fulfill his late wife's dream.

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.summary: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the father of the atomic bomb.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.summary: Barbie sets out on a journey of self-discovery in the real world.

movies.title: Dune: Part One
movies.summary: Paul Atreides must travel to the most dangerous planet to ensure his family's future.

reviews.comment: The Joker was phenomenal. A masterpiece.
